name: PathMotion
description:
The platform helps candidates to become more familiar with potential employers by talking directly to company employees in a forum. This also allows the organisation to credibly gain control of their employer brand, which results in more engaged, better-matched applicants. Organisations worldwide, and across 10+ sectors, use the platform, including universities, whose students engage with applicants in order to attract them.

Our clients range from SME-sized law firms and fledgling startups to multinational corporations and banking institutions like Santander and Citi - the platform scales with the size and needs of our clients, so there's no such thing as too small or too big. 

The platform features a social media tool to help talent teams share the stories that their employees are telling in discussion threads, SEO tools to help boost the careers page's relevance in searches, and Live Chats so candidates can talk to a company's Insiders in real time.

jobs.title: Marketing Manager (French-Speaking)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We are looking for a results-driven Marketing Manager in London to play a key role in raising PathMotion’s brand awareness and generating leads across our core markets to sustain our growth and expansion. The responsibilities of this role will grow as you develop, and will ultimately lead to ownership of the French marketing strategy.

You will be working closely with the founders of PathMotion and the Marketing Director to develop and run inbound and outbound marketing strategies, including:

  • Developing and adapting content for blogs, thought leadership pieces, newsletters and short-form products (infographics, etc.);
  • Developing and implementing a social media strategy informed by the overall marketing strategy;
  • Co-managing our inbound marketing software (HubSpot) to help convert interested prospect clients into leads for the sales team;
  • Support and eventually lead on developing high-quality marketing events with clients (expert webinars, etc.);
  • Managing PathMotion’s external communications channel such as social networks and corporate website, SEO strategy and email campaigns;
  • Support and coordinate our presence at industry events and conferences;
  • Developing and creating video content for our website, social channels, and emails.

This role has the scope to expand and grow with you - we’re looking for entrepreneurial thinkers with a strong understanding of business objectives and how our marketing efforts impact the bottom line.
